Summary: a huge star in the sky. the size of a full-moon. jesus-like
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around April 29th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was just driving home when i noticed a gigantic pulsating star in the sky. very bright and radiating beams. it was right there in the south sky. i thought it was very "jesus" like as dumb as that sounds. very bright with beams all around it.. it looked like a mini sun in the night sky. i believe it was flying south. soon it was no longer visible. could have been a helicopter, but w\ light beaming all around the entire structure, not likely. i went home parked in the garage as i didn't have my phone. ran in, ran out it was gone. garage door was open when came home.. parked.. closed the garage door. ran in grabbed phone ran out.. garage open again. but it was probably because my dad's car was parked over the sensor. which is strange on its own as he never does that. strange night overall .
